manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Amazon Basics D Cell 1.5 Volt Everyday Alkaline Batteries Everyday Alkaline Batteries These batteries offer reliable power for a variety of household electronics, including alarm clocks, remote controls, toys and flashlights. Emergency Ready The batteries can quickly power emergency devices like NOAA weather radios, heavy-duty and LED flashlights, walkie-talkies, and more. 5-Year Shelf Life The batteries offer a 5-year leak-free shelf life. Stock up and store for emergencies or use right away. Frustration-Free Packaging Amazon Basics D Cell batteries ship in Certified Frustration-Free packaging for easy access when needed and convent storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable and Cost-Effective with a great shelf life
reviews.reviewText: The Amazon Basics 24-Pack D Cell Alkaline All-Purpose Batteries have proven to be a reliable and cost-effective solution for powering a variety of devices in our household. With a generous pack size and dependable performance, these batteries have become our go-to choice for everyday needs.One of the key features of this battery pack is its longevity. The D cell alkaline batteries from Amazon Basics consistently deliver a reliable and extended power supply. From powering flashlights during emergencies to keeping our electric shades running smoothly, these batteries have demonstrated a commendable lifespan, reducing the frequency of replacements and saving on overall costs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Same quality for less money
reviews.reviewText: I only buy Amazon Basics Batteries - they are comparable to the name brand in quality & length of life, but less expensive. I haven't bought a different brand in many years now. Definitely recommend trying them!I worked at a mom & pop camera shop as a teenager - we sold more of the lesser known brands of batteries than the name brand because they were pretty much the same quality & a fraction of the price. Lots of factories make multiple branded items that are pretty much the same, just different labels, so I usually give non-name brand items a try to compare. I initially tried Amazon Basics Batteries because of my experience at the camera store. They keep their charge well while in the package & while in use. I have had quite a few that were in use well after their labeled dates. I am just now starting to change out batteries I bought/installed in early 2020 & some are even older than that. With prices so high on everything nowadays, saving money is even more important than ever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always need batteries
reviews.reviewText: This was a good price and the batteries seem to be pretty good and last long enough before needing changing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars 24 D Cells; 17 @1.615volts, 4 @ 1.616 Volts, & 3 @ 1.614 Volts
reviews.reviewText: Purchased on 09 SEP 2023; Received on 11 SEP 2023. Batteries' voltages tested on 11 SEP 2023.Each battery is marked with 03 2028, which I assume is the 'good through' date. The batteries are advertised by Amazon as having a 5-year shelf life, so I suppose I can complain the batteries I received only have a 4-and-a-half year shelf life. However, I am not really worried about it as I suspect I will have either used the batteries before then, or they will last beyond that date. We shall see. Because of the reduced shelf life, I reduced my review by one star. (If half star ratings were allowed, I would have rated them 4.5 stars.)Because others had complained the batteries they received were below a nominal 1.5 volts, I checked the voltage of each of the 24 D cell batteries I received immediately upon delivery. Obviously, each battery I received was above the nominal average for alkaline batteries.Of course, I cannot predict for how long the batteries will hold their charges, nor for how long each battery will last once I put them into service. However, I expect they will store long enough, and last long enough once I put them into service, so that I will not be disappointed with them.If I do experience significant issues with the batteries, I will update this review.For the price ($22.91), for 24 D cell batteries, I believe these batteries to be a very good deal. If they meet or exceed their storage life, and last decently long once put into service, I would be inclined say they are a potentially great deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are holding up well
reviews.reviewText: I use one or two flash lights as dusk approaches quite often just to double check things at the end of a day. People also have a habit of borrowing my backups for the same reason. I've taken no notes, but I'm pretty certain these are working out just as well as the name brands I've used, except for those two everyone knows of. But certainly not near the cost. Since much of the flashlight use is not overly efficient on jobs sites, these are working out very well considering their cost. I'll be getting more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I buy it all the time!
reviews.reviewText: I have some flashlights at home and I always have a stock of this product at home. I buy it all the time and it's really good as it has a good longevity. I totally recommend. Besides it's cheaper than the duracell or others. ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product for the price with good longevity

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great battery for the price
reviews.reviewText: Batteries are one of those items that you never think about unless you need them. Christmas time is when batteries become a necessity in our home; not only for gifts but for decorations as well.Want quality batteries for a good price? Buy these and stock up. We bought one of those battery storage boxes and filled it up.

4 batteries came packed in a so called ''blister-pack''. It took much more time to extract the batteries from the blister-pack than it took to insert them in the flashlight! Batteries work fine. I can't comment on longevity as I just put them in.
Son pilas buenas y vale la pena por el precio

reviews.reviewTitle: Reasonable cost, reasonable performance, easy access via subscribe and save!
reviews.reviewText: We use a lot of D-cell batteries for our outdoor Mr. Beams floodlights. These last about 3 months per light, and are activated at least a dozen times daily, and for up to 30 minutes at a time (lots and lots of dogs running around).Are these the best performing batteries I have ever used in my Mr. Beams, maybe not. Have I had lots of crappier, shorter lasting batteries, absolutely. Are there cheaper batteries out there, for sure, just as there are more expensive batteries. Do these arrive like clockwork without me having to think about them via Subscribe and Save, you betcha!Are these the best batteries ever? No, but they are close to the much pricier, ones. In the long run these are good value in my application, and I never have to worry about running out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Quality and price is excellent. Exactly what I was looking for
